events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's description of receiving the incorrect product.
The case was assigned to agent support_rep_17 for further assistance regarding the refund process.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you get this sorted as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number so that I can verify the transaction?
Sure, I've attached the photos of the item and my order confirmation number in this message for your review.
Thanks for the details. I will process a full refund immediately, and you can keep the incorrect item as a goodwill gesture.
Thank you for the quick resolution and making it easy to get my money back. I appreciate the goodwill offer.
The refund has been processed and a confirmation email sent. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear in your account.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and everything is now satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since we haven't heard back, we are closing this case. Feel free to reach out anytime if you need more help.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support team. Your feedback is valuable to us.
